td.content: s:pt presents with 2 years history of Kidney. patient is a 48 yo white f. she denies smoking she is a heavy drinker o:Height 157 cm, Weight 94.5 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18 a:Chronic Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Lisinopril - 20 mg daily, and ordered Abdominal CT Scan.
